name: Wigwam Arise Low Socks (3 Pack) - Men's
description: Dry feet, and thus, no blisters. These no-show socks use a fabric blend that wicks moisture and adds cushioning. Stay comfortable through an Ironman or out for an afternoon jog. Bonus: it's a 3-pair-pack!Made of moisture-wicking nylon, polyester and spandex.Stay put tabs around the ankle reduce slippage.Breathable mesh vents heat.Cushioned heel and forefoot absorb shocks.Seamless toe closure adds comfort for chafe-free training.
